<Text: The Strongest Man in the World is a 1975 Disney film starring Kurt Russell, still a student in the fictional Medfield College.>

Text: The Strongest Man in the World:  It is the sequel to the 1972 film "Now You See Him, Now You Don't", itself a sequel to the 1969 film, "The Computer Wore Tennis Shoes".
